Sentence: There, Esther meets Lady Dedlock for the first time and feels a strange connection to her (Esther)
Guppy visits Lady Dedlock in London and tells her (Dedlock) he (George) thinks there is a connection between her (Dedlock) and Esther
When Guppy leaves, Lady Dedlock cries: Esther is her (Esther) daughter, who her (Esther) sister claimed had died at birth
While there, Lady Dedlock confronts her (Dedlock) and tells her (Dedlock) she (Dedlock)'s Esther's mother
Bucket asks Esther to join him (Guppy), and they set out in search of Lady Dedlock in the middle of the night
